data.lyric:
[ti:Say Amen (Saturday Night)]
[ar:Panic! At The Disco]
[al:Pray For the Wicked]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Say Amen (Saturday Night) - Panic! At The Disco
[00:14.70]Been traveling in packs that I can't carry anymore
[00:17.36]Been waiting for somebody else to carry me
[00:20.15]There's nothing else there for me at my door
[00:22.96]All the people I know aren't who they used to be
[00:25.69]And if I try to change my life one more day
[00:28.66]There would be nobody else to save
[00:30.65]
[00:31.60]And I can't change into a person I don't wanna be so
[00:34.81]Oh it's Saturday night yeah
[00:37.53]I pray for the wicked on the weekend
[00:40.31]Mama can I get another amen
[00:42.82]
[00:43.53]Oh oh it's Saturday night yeah
[00:48.68]Swear to God I ain't ever gonna repent
[00:51.18]
[00:51.74]Mama can I get another amen
[00:54.35]
[00:54.94]Oh oh it's Saturday night yeah
[01:00.36]
[01:11.66]And every morning when I wake up
[01:14.28]I wanna be who I couldn't say I'd ever been
[01:17.09]But it's so much more than I ever was
[01:20.15]If every night I go to sleep knowing
[01:22.38]
[01:22.89]That I gave everything that I had to give
[01:25.83]Then it's all I could've asked for
[01:27.47]
[01:28.62]I've been standing up beside everything I've ever said but
[01:32.09]Oh it's Saturday night yeah
[01:34.61]I pray for the wicked on the weekend
[01:36.91]
[01:37.41]Mama can I get another amen
[01:40.59]Oh oh it's Saturday night yeah
[01:45.87]Swear to God I ain't ever gonna repent
[01:48.29]
[01:48.87]Mama can I get another amen
[01:52.04]Oh oh it's Saturday night yeah
[01:57.58]
[01:58.35]If I had one more day to wish
[02:00.63]
[02:01.26]If I had one more day
[02:03.23]
[02:04.26]To be better than I could have ever been
[02:08.28]
[02:09.81]If I had one more day to wish
[02:12.10]
[02:12.67]If I had one more day
[02:15.00]
[02:15.56]I could be better but baby
[02:17.37]
[02:17.96]Oh it's Saturday night yeah
[02:20.36]I pray for the wicked on the weekend
[02:22.61]
[02:23.16]Mama can I get another amen
[02:25.83]
[02:26.34]Oh oh it's Saturday night yeah
[02:31.58]Swear to God I ain't ever gonna repent
[02:34.05]
[02:34.58]Mama can I get another amen
[02:37.78]Oh oh it's Saturday night yeah
[02:43.23]
[02:43.90]It's Saturday Saturday Saturday
[02:48.72]
[02:49.39]Oh oh it's Saturday night yeah
[02:54.57]
[02:55.20]Swear to God swear to God swear to God
[03:00.19]
[03:00.70]Oh oh it's Saturday night yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Say Amen (Saturday Night)]
[ar:Panic! At The Disco]
[al:Pray For the Wicked]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:14.70]背上背包去旅行 我带不了更多东西了
[00:17.36]我一直在等那个能载我一程的人
[00:20.15]但门前却空空如也
[00:22.96]我认识的所有人都变了
[00:25.69]如果我继续试着去改变我的生活
[00:28.66]那谁也无法将我拯救
[00:30.65]
[00:31.60]我无法变成别人 我也不想这样
[00:34.81]现在是周六晚上
[00:37.53]我为那邪恶的念头祈福
[00:40.31]妈妈 我能再祈祷一声阿门吗
[00:42.82]
[00:43.53]现在是周六晚上
[00:48.68]我向上帝起誓 我永不后悔
[00:51.18]
[00:51.74]妈妈 我能再祈祷一声阿门吗
[00:54.35]
[00:54.94]现在是周六晚上
[01:00.36]
[01:11.66]每天清晨醒来时
[01:14.28]我都想成为一直未敢说出口的那个人
[01:17.09]但我的思绪却比以往更加复杂
[01:20.15]如果每天晚上入睡时我都知道
[01:22.38]
[01:22.89]我的付出是义务所在
[01:25.83]那我早就可以要求这一切了
[01:27.47]
[01:28.62]对于说过的一切我从未动摇过 但是
